column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: relationship. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: @prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix rel: <http://example.org/relationship/> .rel:Relationship a rdfs:Class .rel:hasPersonA a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain rel:Relationship ;    rdfs:range rdfs:Resource .    rel:hasPersonB a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain rel:Relationship ;    rdfs:range rdfs:Resource .    rel:hasStartDate a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain rel:Relationship ;    rdfs:range xsd:date .    rel:hasEndDate a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain rel:Relationship ;    rdfs:range xsd:date .rel:RelationshipStatus a rdfs:Class .rel:Single a rel:RelationshipStatus .rel:InARelationship a rel:RelationshipStatus .rel:Engaged a rel:RelationshipStatus .rel:Married a rel:RelationshipStatus .rel:Separated a rel:RelationshipStatus .rel:Divorced a rel:RelationshipStatus .rel:Widowed a rel:RelationshipStatus .rel:hasRelationshipStatus a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain rel:Relationship ;    rdfs:range rel:RelationshipStatus .    rel:RelationshipType a rdfs:Class .rel:Friendship a rel:RelationshipType .rel:Family a rel:RelationshipType .rel:Romantic a rel:RelationshipType .rel:Professional a rel:RelationshipType .rel:hasRelationshipType a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain rel:Relationship ;    rdfs:range rel:RelationshipType .
